author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Southern Railway will operate a special train between Coimbatore Junction and Chennai Egmore via Salem, Chinna Salem and Attur on January 17 to clear the Pongal rush. The train No. 06168 Coimbatore Junction – Chennai Egmore special will leave Coimbatore at 5.30 a.m. on January 17 and will reach Chennai Egmore at 4.15 p.m.

The train will stop at Coimbatore North, Tirupur, Uttukuli, Erode, Sankaridurg, Salem Junction, Salem Town, Attur, Chinna Salem, Vridhachalam, Villupuram, Tindivanam, Melmaruvathur, Chengalpattu, Tambaram, Mambalam.

Reservation

Advance reservation for this train is already open, a press release of the Salem Railway Division issued here on Tuesday said.
title: Special train to clear Pongal rush
